column1: Eric, what is it this time?
Can you lay on your stomach?
What the?  What is this? A hamburger?
Why are there hamburgers in your underwear?
This doesn't make sense. Are you trying to sneak food into the school or something?
Hello Mrs. Melman, this is the school nurse. I'm afraid your son has had a little accident.
No no, it's not serious, but he went number two during class.  I'm afraid he's gonna need a new pair of pants and underwear, and a clean pair of socks.
